bibl.title: (Il)Literacy - Conclusions from the Papyri and Other Objects from Greco-Roman World.
bibl.note: La contribution figure exclusivement dans la version électronique de l'ouvrage, non dans la version imprimée. - Intends (a) to provide a brief survey of what is known from the documentary papyri, (b) to demonstrate the benefit from a detailed investigation into selected papyri for research about ancient education and (il)literacy, and (c) from integrating other archaeological objects as well. Palaeographical data are utilized when appropriate. - Avec résumé en anglais.
